mapper.insert: insert into board (b_title, b_context, b_date, b_cnt, FK_u_number) values(#{b_title},#{b_context}, #{b_date},#{b_cnt},#{FK_u_number})
mapper.update: update board set b_title = #{b_title}, b_context = #{b_context} where b_number = #{b_number}
mapper.select: SET @rownum:=0; select * from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as num ,b_number, b_title, b_context, b_date, FK_u_number from board where @rownum < (#{pageNum} * #{amount}) order by b_number desc) A where num >(#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount};

SET @rownum:=0; select * from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as num ,b_number, b_title, b_context, b_date, FK_u_number from board where FK_u_number = #{FK_u_number} and @rownum < (#{pageNum} * #{amount}) order by b_number desc) A where num >(#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount};
